channel.title: 508 Client help
channel.description:
Hi i need help with umairscape client when i try to run it gives me this
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: 508 Client help
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

No problem.

Also, chances are, you’ll be recieveing that error with most clients.

Just change the number in the run to 1024, and add -cp .

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Im not online.

@Mosh

Change it to this:

@echo off cd files java -Xmx1024m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1 pause

That should hopefully work.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help
item.dc:creator: @mosh999 mosh999
item.description:
@mosh999 wrote:

@echo off
cd files
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

that what you need?

add me on msn lilstonerboy09@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.description:
@Blain2007 wrote:

item.title: 508 Client help
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Lul, wrong.

Mosh, it means it cant find client’s class. Post the code you have inside of the bat here and ill try to help.

PS - Have you set the variables also?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help
item.dc:creator: @Blain2007 Blain2007
item.description:
@Blain2007 wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Obviously means your client.txt needs to be edited, althought im still new to 508 coding myself so i dont know codes
